name: جاسوس الموت
description:
جاسوس الموت is a 50 level top down shooter where you go on a mission from Orisis after you land in Duat to assassinate a target on a tropical island. 

Each level, you will only have 6 bullets to shoot with. Enemies come in different shapes and sizes with some requiring more than one bullet to kill.

Use your bullets carefully as you shoot multiple enemies at once to clear each area getting to the hotel suite on the tropical island.

This was a fun side project that was completed in two days.
